root.name: I heart Geeks!
root.description: OverviewWith over 100 puzzles, I â™¥ Geeks is a game where it is the heroic geeks versus the vile jocks. You are a geek who works with at a laboratory where odd machines are made. With the help of the scientists at the lab you get revenge on the jocks. Gameplay is similar to The Incredible Machine. The game is slated to include multiplayer and Wi-Fi support.

similar_games.game: Return of the Incredible Machine: Contraptions
